name: Slides from HTML5 Dev Conf 2013
tagline: Slides from @adobe-webplatform team presented at HTML5 Dev Conf.
body:
# Slides from HTML5DevConf 2013
## Presented by [Adobe Web Platform Team](http://twitter.com/adobeweb)

- [Finally! Layout in CSS](http://adobe-webplatform.github.io/html5devconf-2013/FinallyCSSLayoutTalk/index.html) by [Alan Stearns](http://twitter.com/alanstearns)
- [Unmasking the GPU: Using Hardware Acceleration correctly in CSS](http://nimbu.in/html5devconf-oct/) by [Divya Manian](http://twitter.com/divya)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
